subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “crosswise > door rail; side; [[cross-grained]]; unrestrained”
* Related to {{och-l|衡|crossbar}}, {{och-l|桁|[[purlin]]}}, {{och-l|珩|top horizontal gem of a girdle-pendant}} and {{och-l|璜|jade pendant}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}), and possibly {{och-l|樑|roof beam}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
* {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} connects these with {{cog|km|ខ្វែង||to cross; to intersect; to crisscross; diagonal; etc.}} < {{cog|mkh-okm|khveṅ||to go far around; to encircle; to enclose}}. Compare {{cog|th|ขวาง||to lie across; to bar; to obstruct; to thwart}} and the {{cog|km|-}} derivatives {{m|km|កំពែង||enclosing wall; rampart}}, {{m|km|កំពង់||crossing-place; ford; port; shore}} (cf. {{cog|ms|kampung}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[middle]] [[rail]] of a [[wooden]] [[door]]; [[crosspiece]]
# to [[lie]] [[crossways]]; to be [[situated]] [[crosswise]]; to be [[horizontal]]
# to [[move]] [[crosswise]]; to [[cross]]; to [[traverse]]; to [[stretch]] [[across]]
# to [[cut]] [[crosswise]]; to [[intercept]] [[transversely]]
# to [[hold]] [[crosswise]]; to [[put]] something [[horizontally]]; to [[wear]] [[across]]
# [[crosswise]]; [[horizontal]]; [[transverse]]; [[across]]; [[east]]-[[west]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[horizontal|Horizontal]] [[alliance|Alliance]], i.e. [[state]]s during the [[Warring States]] period in [[Chinese]] [[history]] which [[ally]] with [[Qin]] to [[participate]] in its [[ascendancy]]
# [[side]]; [[nearby]]; something [[situate]]d [[sideways]]
# to [[cast]] a [[sidelong]] [[glance]] at; to [[look]] [[sideways]]
# to [[brim]] with; to be [[brimming]] with; to [[fill]]; to be [[found]] [[all over]]
# to [[place]] [[over]]; to [[cover]]
# [[broad]]; [[vast]]; [[wide]]; [[extensive]]
# to [[crisscross]]; to [[interlock]]; to [[intersect]]; to be [[mixed]] together
# not [[listen]]ing to [[reason]]; [[unreasonable]]; [[unrestrained]]; [[outrageous]]
# {{lb|zh|Chinese calligraphy}} [[horizontal]] [[stroke]] ({{zh-l|*㇐}})
#* {{zh-ant|豎}}
# {{lb|zh|historical}} {{zh-alt-form|衡|[[supervisor]]; [[picket]]}}
# {{lb|zh|historical}} {{zh-alt-form|黌|[[school]]}}
# [[ancient]] [[placename]] in [[modern-day]] [[Shangqiu]] [[city]] in [[Henan]] [[province]] of China
# {{lb|zh|Beijing Mandarin|Jilu Mandarin}} [[probably]]; [[presumably]]; [[perhaps]]; [[maybe]]
# {{lb|zh|Beijing Mandarin|dialectal Wu}} [[anyway]]; [[anyhow]]; [[in any case]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
